com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Interface WorkspaceLayerSource

All Superinterfaces:
LayerSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseWorkspaceLayerSource
Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.

public interface WorkspaceLayerSource
extends LayerSource

A type of LayerSource that has access to Datasets that can be contained within a Workspace. Normally the Datasets will consist of FeatureClasses.

See Also:
Workspace

          Deprecated. Produces the Workspace that contains the underlying FeatureClasses.
